title: San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do      For an orientation to this unique historical site, please begin by stopping at the visitor center, located at 499 Jefferson Street, San Francisco, California, 94109. Open seven days a week from 9:30am to 5pm, call 415-447-5000. The visitor center is across the street from Hyde Street Pier where you can explore the park's collection of historic vessels. View exhibits and films in the visitor center and on BalcluthaJoin park ranger-led interpretive programs and demonstrations on the historic ships and Hyde Street PierEnjoy wayside exhibits and hands-on activities on Hyde Street PierVisit the Maritime Research Center, gateway to the parkâ€™s collections
